text: The Uzbek Soviet Socialist Republic was a part of the Soviet Union comprised in Central Asia. Its borders encompassed much of the modern day territories of Uzbekistan. Category:Republics of the Soviet Union Category:20th-century establishments in Uzbekistan Category:States and territories established in the 20th century Category:States and territories disestablished in the 1990s Category:1920s establishments in the Soviet Union Category:1924 establishments in Asia Category:1991 disestablishments in the Soviet Union
title: Uzbek Soviet Socialist Republic
